Subject: Reading: Michael Cieslak and Nicole E. Castle
Description: The authors read from their works.  Speakers include:Nicole e. Castle, Michael Cieslak - Track: Lit  - Duration: 1 hour

Subject: The Dark Side -- The Reanimation of Horror
Description: There has been a resurgence of dark speculative fiction in the past few years. Numerous movies and television programs have appeared including many created by specific platforms (Amazon Prime, Netflix). What is behind this reappearance of horror, or has it been there lurking in the shadows all along?  Speakers include:Nicole e. Castle, Michael Cieslak - Track: Media  - Duration: 1 hour

Subject: Authors Should Play with Dead Things
Description: Vampires, werewolves, demons, for centuries they have been the villains of our tales...but what if you want to write them as heroes? The panel will discuss the creation of believable supernatural characters and the worlds they populate.  Speakers include:Nicole e. Castle, Mary Lynne Gibbs, Michael Cieslak, Colleen Nye - Track: Lit  - Duration: 1 hour
